products.name: Gerber Cereal for Baby 1st Foods Rice Single Grain

extendedInfo.detail: Supported Sitter.  Halal.  60% DV of iron for learning-ability.  Non GMO Project verified. nongmoproject.org.  No. 1 pediatrician recommended brand (Among the pediatricians who recommended infant cereal) for infant cereals. Strat smart with little bites and big nutrition. Gerber Cereals are made with 11 essential nutrients to help your little one grow and thrive. Iron for growing brains. Just two servings of Gerber Infant Cereal meet your little one's daily iron needs to help support brain development and learning ability. That's so smart! Supported Sitter. Your Baby may be Ready for this Cereal if they: Sit with support. On tummy, push up arms with straight elbows. Lean towards spoon with an open mouth. This package is sold by weight, out volume, and may not appear full due to settling of contents. Every bite counts! Learn more.  Visit Gerber.com to chat with a MyGerber Baby Expert 1-800-4-GERBER.  We take action to protect the planet - so Gerber babies will grow and thrive for generations to come. Visit Gerber.com/sustainabilty to learn more. Terracycle.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Rice Flour, Soy Lecithin, Potassium Phosphate, Vitamins And Minerals: Calcium Carbonate, Iron (Ferrous Fumarate), Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Zinc Sulfate, Vitamin E (Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate), Niacinamide, Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), Vitamin B1 (Thiamin Mononitrate), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxide Hydrochloride), Vitamin B12, Folic Acid.
extendedInfo.directions: Easy-to-Mix Directions: 1. Pour desired amount of cereal in bowl. 2. Stir in liquid (breastmilk of infant formula) to desired consistency. Serve as is or warm in the microwave. Always test temperature before feeding. Discard any unfed cereal. Completely cooked and ready to serve. Just add liquid. Mix! Baby's first cereal. Mix 1 Tbsp. cereal with 4-5 Tbsp. of breastmilk or infant formula. Microwave: Microwave Guidelines for Heating: Warm unheated liquid at medium (50% power) for 15-30 seconds. Mix heated liquid with cereal. Stir to even out temperature. Test temperature before feeding.  Store in a cool, dry place.  Twist cap off, remove seal & twist back on.  Use within 30 days after opening.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: soy.Do not use if seal is damaged. Keep container dry. Keep package away from children.
